summary: Unhappy Larry Burrows sees what his life could've been like, had he made that winning home run as a teenager.
cast: Jim Belushi|Linda Hamilton|Michael Caine|Jon Lovitz|Hart Bochner|Bill McCutcheon|Rene Russo|Jay O. Sanders|Maury Chaykin|Pat Corley|Douglas Seale|Courteney Cox|Doug Barron|Jeff Weiss|Tony Longo|Kathy Ireland|Andy Stahl|Bryan Buffington|Sari Caine|Martin Thompson|Michael Genevie|Osamu Sakabe|Howard Kingkade|Eddita Hill|Collin Bernsen|William Griffis|John Garver|Terry Loughlin|Adam C. Eichhorst|Jeffrey Pillars|Rich Devaney|Bruce Evers|Whit Edwards|Sky Berdahl|Raymond L. Anderson|Heather Lynch|James Douglas|Chris Stacy|Jesse J. Donnelly|Darren W. title: Un destino de ida y vuelta
